name: Torque (Fernofai)
description:
As a steamroller, roll over as many plants as possible to refill your fuel, weaken the forest’s spirit and pave the way for another bank building!

Torque was made by Paul Brodmann, Lukas Kühne and Leon Unger within 48 hours for the Global Game Jam 2023 with the theme "Roots".

Special Thanks go to Aleixo Alonso and Gustav Ziemer for their help with 3D modeling and music!

We also used a sound from newlocknew on Freesound.org: https://freesound.org/people/newlocknew/sounds/626734/.
